verbs.description: aurora police investigate attempt to [V: steal] [ARG1: atm] [ARGM-MNR: with tractor police] are investigating a failed attempt saturday by would - be thieves to use a tractor to steal an atm the aurora police department said the attempt occurred at the wells fargo branch at 3521 n tower road the suspects fled from the scene and are not in custody police aurora colorado wells fargo aurora colo 3521 n tower road aurora police department 3521 n tower road
